title: Shoujo M
description:
Morita Hideo raped and toyed with a little girl he was supposed to tutor, all the while falsely promising to marry her. He then moved away and forgot her, confident that he would never got caught.

Fast forward 10 years. Morita has landed a comfortable teaching job and a lovely wife. Life is good, until a familiar looking girl shows up at his school one day. The sins of his past have finally caught up to him.

matches.title: Kangoku Zemi Kanshu ni Zettai Fukujuu o Shiirarete
